title: Mini freeze spikes
body: So, I have this issue where once or twice (I think it's always at the very early stages of the game) I have a drop to 0 fps for a very brief moment. It happens when Im about to die, I believe it sometimes happen when i place my first trinket (ward). Someone might know what is causing it, and maybe I can find a way to get rid of it? I cant count how many times I have died being unable to heal or flash, it's so annoying. I can run the game at 60fps at max settings throughout it's whole length, so it's even weirder in that aspect.

replies.body: It's possible that a bad game file or outdated driver could be failing to render specific moments in-game, and causing a drop in your frames.  Try out the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune things up.  That should hopefully do the trick, though let me know!

I ran client repair, checked my drivers, freed some disk space, disabled unwanted programs from running in the background, made a reset on graphics card software. It didn't help. If it is file related issue, should i try reinstalling my league?

No, a repair would have resolved any corrupted game file so a reinstall wouldn't really do anything.  In this case, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)  so our tech team can take a closer look with you.  Grab our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to obtain some logs, and attach it to your ticket for more context.  We'll get back to you!
